title: Bottom-up population totals for administrative units in Nigeria
desc: This zip file contains population totals for administrative units in Nigeria (i.e. states and local government areas). The boundaries are included as shapefiles with the population estimates included in the attribute tables. The population estimates are also included as .csv spreadsheets.
citation: WorldPop. 2019. Bottom-up gridded population estimates for Nigeria, version 1.2. WorldPop, University of Southampton. doi:10.5258/SOTON/WP00655

title: Bottom-up gridded population estimates (~100m) for Nigeria
desc: This zip file contains a geotiff raster with estimates of total population size for each approximately 100 m grid cell across the study area. It also contains a geotiff raster with estimates of uncertainty in the population estimates.
citation: WorldPop. 2019. Bottom-up gridded population estimates for Nigeria, version 1.2. WorldPop, University of Southampton. doi:10.5258/SOTON/WP00655

title: Mastergrid for gridded population estimates
desc: This geotiff raster contains the mastergrid used to define where population estimates were made. It contains a value of 1 where population estimates were made and a value of 0 or NA everywhere else. Cell IDs from the mastergrid can be used to lookup values in the SQL database.
citation: WorldPop. 2019. Bottom-up gridded population estimates for Nigeria, version 1.2. WorldPop, University of Southampton. doi:10.5258/SOTON/WP00655

title: Description of the methods used to produce the NGA v1.x bottom-up gridded population estimates.
desc: This zip file contains a peer-reviewed manuscript describing the methods used to produce population estimates in this data set including model code and input data.
citation: Leasure DR, Jochem WC, Weber EM, Seaman V, Tatem AJ. 2020. National population mapping from sparse survey data: A hierarchical Bayesian modeling framework to account for uncertainty. Proceedings of the National Academy of Sciences. doi:10.1073/pnas.1913050117.

title: README: NGA Population v1.2
desc: This README file provides information about the data included in the data release, how it was produced, source data that were used, and known assumptions and limitations of the results.
citation: WorldPop. 2019. Bottom-up gridded population estimates for Nigeria, version 1.2. WorldPop, University of Southampton. doi:10.5258/SOTON/WP00655
